content.html: Hey, I want to remind everyone that you can and should dress up like a widow who has had several husbands who died under mysterious circumstances when running errands. Wear a ball gown to the grocery store. Wear a formal dress to the post office. No one can stop you.
content.value:
Hey, I want to remind everyone that you can and should dress up like a widow who has had several husbands who died under mysterious circumstances when running errands. 

Wear a ball gown to the grocery store. Wear a formal dress to the post office. No one can stop you.

photo.alt: Orange hair weirdo wearing a ridiculously fancy black floor length robe with feathers at a kroger
